reviewText:
Playboy - Sexy Lingerie II is fifty-three minutes and was released on video on November 19, 1991. This was a stepped down from the original Sexy Lingerie. The lingerie on the Playmates and models looked second rate and this time around I wrote some comments about the scenarios; which I did not do last time. The ladies looked great but the wardrobe department left something to be desire. Two Playmates that were in the original Sexy Lingerie (Terri Lynn Doss & Ava Fabian) show up again for the sequel. The following are the scenarios in this video.

Fantasy Express: Part I-Sometimes the camera seems to be out of focus or too far away to enjoy.
Decent Exposure-Lingerie does not look sexy.
Country Girl-Yawn
Vamps
Sunday Snaps
Mannequins
Fantasy Express: Part II
Beauty and the Beach
Satin Doll: Pamela Anderson is nude
Harem Chic: Yawn Part 2 has some nudity towards the end of the fantasy.
Fashion Fantasy
Flying High
Fantasy Express: Part III

There is one less Playmate in this video, but the models do get film credits this time around.

Pamela Anderson-Playboy Playmate of the Month for February 1990
Tina Bockrath-Playboy Playmate of the Month for May 1990
Terri Lynn Doss-Playboy Playmate of the Month for July 1988
Deborah Driggs-Playboy Playmate of the Month for March 1990
Ava Fabian-Playboy Playmate of the Month for August 1986
Karen Foster-Playboy Playmate of the Month for October 1989
Fawna MacLaren-Playboy Playmate of the Month for July 1989 & 35th Anniversary Playmate
Lisa Matthews-Playboy Playmate of the Month for April 1990 & Playboy Playmate of the Year 1991
Petra Verkaik-Playboy Playmate of the Month for December 1989
Teri Weigel-Playboy Playmate of the Month for April 1986

Models

D'Andrea Bryant
Donna Spangler
Sandra Wild

This video did not live up to the original at all. Playboy - Sexy Lingerie II gets a B-.
